elements.Text: Is it okay to occasionally answer a question from your boss incorrectly?

elements.name: Correction_Work/Career Development_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.

elements.text: Remember, the more you practice thinking about situations in new ways on our app, the more you'll be able to think positively about scary situations in your life!
